label: Population - Male, 15 to 44
description: Population estimate for 2014 - where sex is male and age is greater than 15 and less than or equal to 44

label: Population - Black or African American
description: Population estimate for 2014 - with one race reported as black or african american

label: Population - Hispanic or Latino
description: Population estimate for 2014 - any race with orgin reported as hispanic or latino

label: Killed by Police - Count
description: Number of people killed by police in 2015 as reported to The Guardian (The Counted Project)

label: Violent Crime - Count
description: Violent crimes reported in 2014 including muder & non-negligent homicide, sexual assault, aggrevated assault & robbery, collected by the FBI

label: Murder & Non-negligent Manslaughter - Count
description: Muder & non-negligent homicide in 2014, collected by the FBI

label: Police Officers Employed - Count
description: Police officers employed in 2014, collected by the FBI

label: Male, 15 to 44 - Percent of Total Population
description: Percent of total population that is male between the ages of 15 and 44

label: Black or African American - Percent of Total Population
description: Percent of total population with one race reported black or african american

label: Hispanic or Latino - Percent of Total Population
description: Percent of total population with origin reported as hispanic or latin

label: Killed by Police - per 100k Population
description: People killed by police represented as a yearly rate per 100,000 population

label: Violent Crime - per 100k Population
description: Violent crimes reported represented as a yearly rate per 100,000 population

label: Murder & Non-negligent Manslaughter - per 100k Population
description: Murder & non-negligent manslaughter represented as a yearly rate per 100,000 population

label: Police Officers Employed - per 100k Population
description: Police officers employed represented as a yearly rate per 100,000 population
